about_the_game:
This resource pack allows you to create your own original sword by freely combining the three parts that make up a sword: the blade, the guard, and the grip.The swords you create can be used by equipping them to your 3D characters, or they can be used as map objects.

Layout and events used in the scene from 0:22 in the PV are not included.

[Ultimate Modular Swords] Contents
- Sample Map: 1
- 3D Stamps: 376
- Blades: 25 types (49 variations)
- Decoration for each blade: 50
- Guards: 10 types (29 variations)
- Guard Decoration: 14
- Grips: 11 types (38 variations)
- Grip Decoration: 48
- Other Decorative Assets: 66
- Prefabs: 36
